title: Syria's Ghouta faces worst death toll in years
text:
Syria's Ghouta faces worst death toll in years 4:25pm GMT - 01:34 
Pro-government forces bombarded Syria's eastern Ghouta on Tuesday, killing at least 49 people, after the heaviest one-day death toll there in three years on Monday, a war monitoring group said. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
